name: Cosmic Warzone
description:
Commands:

P1:

-W, A, S, D- or -Joy1 left stick- : Move ship. Move cursor at options menu. 

-I- or -Joy1 A- : Fire (hold to charge)

-O- or -Joy1 X- : Bomb

-U- or -Joy1 B- : Spread shot

-Enter- or -Start- : Pause

-Select- or -Esc- : Quit

P2:

-For keyboard use numpad

-4, 5, 6, 8- or -Joy2 left stick- : Move ship. Move cursor at options menu. 

-3- or -Joy2 A- : Fire (hold to charge)

-7- or -Joy1 X- : Bomb

-9- or -Joy1 B- : Spread shot

-Enter- or -Start- : Pause

-Select- or -Esc- : Quit

OBS:

- Keyboard or XInput joystick only. 

- When a joystick is connected, the keyboard direction commands are blocked. It was necessary to prevent glitches. 

- The game was developed with Gamemaker: Studio 1.4. There is a known issue with games developed with this version of Gamemaker running on recent versions of Windows 10: the game stutters, making it run slow. I did my best to fix the problem and now it runs pretty well in my machine but let me know if you find this problem while running the game.

Hope you enjoy it. :)
